mapper.insert: insert into item (itid, itemcontent, itemindex, instanceid, labelid) values (#{itid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labelid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select itid, itemcontent, itemindex, instanceid, labelid from item
